column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Had a birthday/anniversary dinner here this past weekend and it did not disappoint! Amazing atmosphere - very romantic
column2: almost speak easy feel to the place. Quality food all around - we had a filet and a ribeye
column3: both were cooked brilliantly. We had the crab cake which was huge and probably the best crab cake I've ever had. Corn and Mac and cheese did not disappoint either. Lastly
column4: exceptional service from the hostess desk to waiter to the clearing staff!
